column1: National parks have famous structures too!
What historic buildings are on your bucket list?
Tag someone who loves historic buildings!
It is not the beauty of a building you should look at; its the construction of the foundation that will stand the test of time. - David Allan Coe
Good buildings come from good people, and all problems are solved by good design. - Stephan Gardiner
A building has integrity just like a man. And just as seldom. - Ayn Rand
Great buildings, like great mountains, are the work of centuries. - Victor Hugo
When we build, let us think that we build forever. - John Ruskin
Architecture is the very mirror of life. You only have to cast your eyes on buildings to feel the presence of the past, the spirit of a place; they are the reflection of society. - I.M Pei
